idea-plugin.name: Git User Switch
idea-plugin.change-notes:
What's New in 1.1.0:
- 修复点击取消后直接提交了
- 新增在基于项目固定 Git 用户(存储于.idea目录)
- Fixed an issue where clicking "Cancel" still proceeded with commit
- Added support for pinning Git user per project (stored in the .idea directory)
idea-plugin.description: Each time the code is submitted, a prompt pops up asking the user to select git user and automatically switches. source: https://github.com/adeuxy/ideagitswitch contact: a@adeuxy.com
